definition: (biochemistry) interference in or inhibition of the physiological action of a chemical substance by another having a similar structure
details:
noun
- (biochemistry) interference in or inhibition of the physiological action of a chemical substance by another having a similar structure
- an actively expressed feeling of dislike and hostility
- the relation between opposing principles or forces or factors
= example: the relation between opposing principles or forces or factors
- a state of deep-seated ill-will
= synonyms: hostility
